property.description: Link to the repository where the un-compiled, human readable code and related code is located (SVN, github, CodePlex).
property.name: Code repository

property.description: Runtime platform or script interpreter dependencies (Example - Java v1, Python2.3, .Net Framework 3.0).
property.name: Runtime platform

property.description: The version of the CreativeWork embodied by a specified resource.
property.name: Software version

property.description: The command used to execute the task.
property.name: Command

property.description: Name of a branch to fetch.
property.name: Branch

property.description: SHA hash (or PREFIX) of a commit to fetch.
property.name: Commit
